name: Pizza Hawaii
steps:
Preheat Oven: Preheat your oven to its highest setting, usually between 475°F (245°C) and 500°F (260°C). If using a pizza stone, place it in the oven while it preheats.
Prepare Dough: On a lightly floured surface, stretch or roll the pizza dough into a 12-inch circle. Place it on a baking sheet sprinkled with cornmeal.
Add Sauce and Cheese: Spread the pizza sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a 1-inch border for the crust. Top with the shredded mozzarella cheese.
Add Toppings: Distribute the ham and pineapple chunks over the cheese. If using bacon, add it now.
Bake: Bake for 10-15 minutes on the lowest rack until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly and slightly charred.
Serve: Let the pizza cool for a few minutes before slicing.
